cause.description:
Christian Adoption Services is a non-profit adoption agency that has increased efforts to do more for the 143 million orphaned children around the world, irregardless of whether they are adoptable. Gifts to orphanages are just one small thing the agency is trying to put together. Help can be in the form of monetary donations or supplies to enable the caretakers to provide the best care possible.
1. Raise awareness for the powerless.
cause.mission: Being a voice for the orphans by providing basic needs through financial assitance, work trips abroad and adoption.
cause.name: Help An Orphan
